trial_identification.studytitle: Skins>> Travel and Recovery (JetSkins) Flight Trial 1001
trial_identification.scientifictitle: A Randomized, Crossover, Open-Label Study of the Effectiveness of JetSkins in Reducing In-Flight Ankle Oedema

conditioncode.conditioncode2: Diseases of the vasculature and circulation including the lymphatic system

interventions.interventions: Skins>> Travel and Recovery compression garments (JetSkins) ARTG ID: 80116 Class 1 Medical Device these are worn prior to take off and for the duration of the flight sector (minimum of 5 hours). There is a mimimum 48 hour washout period between flights.
interventions.comparator: The control is nil intervention for the duration of another minimum 5 hour flight sector.

primaryOutcome.outcome: Reduced ankle oedema - the difference between ankle circumference

secondaryOutcome.outcome: Numerical rating scales + 5 hours after take off for pain, discomfort and swelling in legs, energy, alertness and concentration.

eligibility.inclusivecriteria: Confirmed return flight booking with at least a 5 hour continuous sector in both directions.
eligibility.exclusivecriteria: Previous history of DVT Cardiovascular disease Coagulation disorders Varicose veins Bone or joint problems Diabetes Hypertension Obesity Neoplastic disease within previous 2 years except BCC.

trial_design.sequence: Computer generated sequence, simple randomisation i.e. no blocks or stratification

ethicsAndSummary.summary: This study is being conducted in order to see if JetSkins reduce ankle swelling associated with flying. There have been other studies on garments very similar to JetSkins (compression garments) that show you can significantly reduce swelling in your ankles if you wear these garments during long haul flights (over 5 hours).
ethicsAndSummary.publication: A randomised crossover study of low-ankle-pressure graduated-compression tights in reducing flight-induced ankle oedema Melissa J Hagan and Stephen M Lambert Med J Aust 2008; 188 (2): 81-84.

ethicscommitee.ethicname: Bellberry Human Research Committee-Skins Compression Garments Pty Ltd

contact.name: Steve Lambert
contact.address: Skins Compression Garments Pty Ltd Suites 16-18 171-179 Queen St Campbelltown NSW 2560
